title: Client Love
subtitle: Kind words from brides and photoshoot clients

items.name: Aisha K.
items.quote: My makeup lasted 18 hours through heat and happy tears. Felt like myself—just elevated.

items.name: Rhea D.
items.quote: Skin looked like skin on camera. Subtle sculpt, stunning eyes—exactly as briefed.

items.name: Meera S.
items.quote: Smooth booking, punctual, and hygienic. Loved the soft dewy base.
